text.name: console_notes
text.text: The Atari 7800 ProSystem, or simply the Atari 7800, is a home video game console officially released by the Atari Corporation in 1986. It is almost fully backward-compatible with the Atari 2600, the first console to have backward compatibility without the use of additional modules.

text.name: graphics
text.text: Graphics: MARIA custom chip clocked at 7.16MHz

text.name: sound
text.text: Sound: 2 channel handled by the TIA
